h2.span: I need to ENROLL my child

div.div: Due to the COVID 19 virus, the Chesterfield County School District enrollment and withdrawal process has changed during this time.
If you are new to the district and need to Enroll your child, please send an email to Brian Batson at bbatson@chesterfieldschools.org.
Someone will then get back with you regarding the next steps. If you don't hear back from someone, please call 843-623-2175 and ask for Mr. Batson.

The enrollment process will be mostly electronic with the exception of the completing a printed copy of the home language survey, which can be picked up at the district office at 401 West Blvd, in Chesterfield SC.
Please include a good contact email/phone number on your email to Mr. Batson.
